short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A one stop easy-to-use solution to track your issues & PRs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UnGit is an all-in-one solution to manage your GitHub issues and pull requests. It will update you on any status update of any repository. It provides an easy-to-use dashboard to know about your contribution station at a glance.

For installation :
1. Install the extension
2. Click on the extension
3. Provide Github username

NOTE: First time loading can take few minutes. So don't worry and be patient.
